column4: hi all. i've a virtual server running ubuntu 8.04. when i first logged in, there was only a root user account, so i tried to add a new user using useradd. for some reason though, i don't get prompted for the user info, shouldn't it do this normally ?
useradd is low level, adduser is higher level
sorry, i meant adduser. i tried both
As far as I know, add user should prompt for finger information unless you specified --gecos
